DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of Nivolumab in unresectable advanced or recurrent esophageal cancer patients who have failed in standard chemotherapies.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Nivolumab in Unresectable Advanced or Recurrent Esophageal Cancer
